类 CircuitCalculator

java.lang.Object
  CircuitCalculator

public class CircuitCalculator
extends java.lang.Object

Program for calculating properties of a voltage divider circuit

字段摘要
static double supplyVoltage
           
 
构造方法摘要
CircuitCalculator()
          Constructor, sets up the user interface
 
方法摘要
 void calculateCircuitChallenge()
           
 void calculateCircuitCompletion()
           
 void calculateCircuitCore()
          Calculates and prints the following properties of a voltage divider circuit: output voltage, current, power, supply current and power efficiency of circuit Asks the user for the supply voltage, the resistors R1 and R2, and the resistance of the load.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

public void calculateCircuitCore()
Calculates and prints the following properties of a voltage divider circuit: output voltage, current, power, supply current and power efficiency of circuit Asks the user for the supply voltage, the resistors R1 and R2, and the resistance of the load.
